title: How to Cancel a PayPal Payment

steps.title: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser. If you're not automatically logged in, click Log In in the upper-right corner of the window and enter your credentials.

steps.title: Click .
steps.content: Click . This is the Settings icon in the upper-right corner of the window.

steps.title: Click the Payments tab.
steps.content: Click the Payments tab. It's near the top-center of the window.

steps.title: Click Manage pre-approved payments.
steps.content: Click Manage pre-approved payments . It's in the center of the window.

steps.title: Click the payment you'd like to cancel.
steps.content: Click the payment you'd like to cancel. You may need to click on Next Page in the bottom-right corner of the window to find the payment you're looking for if you have multiple recurring payments.

steps.title: Click Cancel.
steps.content: Click Cancel . It's next to "Status" under "Billing Details."

steps.title: Click Yes to confirm.
steps.content: Click Yes to confirm. This confirms the cancellation of the recurring payment.

steps.title: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.paypal.com in a web browser. If you're not automatically logged in, click Log In in the upper-right corner of the window and enter your credentials.

steps.title: Click Activity at the top of the window.
steps.content: Click Activity at the top of the window.

steps.title: Click on the payment you want to cancel.
steps.content: Click on the payment you want to cancel. It must be under the "Pending" section of the Activity tab. If the payment you want to cancel is in the “Completed” section of the Activity tab, the payee has already received the payment, and it cannot be canceled or refunded. To get your money back you must request a refund or contact the Resolution Center . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Verify that the payment is unclaimed.
steps.content: Verify that the payment is unclaimed. At the bottom of the transaction dialog box, you'll see a message that "[Username] hasn't accepted yet" next to a Cancel link.

steps.title: Click Yes to confirm.
steps.content: Click Yes to confirm. Your payment has been canceled.
